title: Evaluate Network function not running
body:
Hi there, 


I am using DLC for tracking multiple animals. Up to the point where I want to evaluate the network, everything works fine. But when hitting evaluate network I run into problems and the important pickle file is not created.

**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
Windows 10 with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2.2b4, Python 3.7.7

**Describe the problem**
After running evaluate network in the project manager GUI I get the following error messages:

```
Initializing ResNet
Activating extracting of PAFs
Analyzing data...
1219it [09:57,  2.04it/s]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\evaluate_network.py", line 257, in evaluate_network
    plotting=plotting,show_errors=True,comparisonbodyparts=self.bodyparts)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\evaluate.py", line 340, in evaluate_network
    comparisonbodyparts,gputouse,modelprefix,c_engine=c_engine)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\evaluate_multianimal.py", line 177, in evaluate_multianimal_full
    cfg['dotsize'], cfg['alphavalue'], cfg['pcutoff'])
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\visualization.py", line 180, in make_multianimal_labeled_image
    fig, ax = prepare_figure_axes(w, h)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\visualization.py", line 225, in prepare_figure_axes
    fig = plt.figure(frameon=False, figsize=(width * scale / dpi, height * scale / dpi))
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\pyplot.py", line 525, in figure
    **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 2132, in new_figure_manager
    return super().new_figure_manager(num, *args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backend_bases.py", line 3218, in new_figure_manager
    return cls.new_figure_manager_given_figure(num, fig)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 2136, in new_figure_manager_given_figure
    frame = cls._frame_class(num, figure)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 1170, in __init__
    self.toolbar = self._get_toolbar(self.statusbar)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 1207, in _get_toolbar
    toolbar = NavigationToolbar2Wx(self.canvas)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 1495, in __init__
    NavigationToolbar2.__init__(self, canvas)
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backend_bases.py", line 2593, in __init__
    self._init_toolbar()
  File "C:\Users\imgross\.conda\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\backends\backend_wx.py", line 1531, in _init_toolbar
    self.Realize()
wx._core.wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "Assert failure" failed at ..\..\src\msw\toolbar.cpp(938) in wxToolBar::Realize(): Could not add bitmap to toolbar
```
Do you have an idea what could be the problem?

Best,
Isa
